H0.text: In which city are the administrative headquarters of the county of Cornwall. Penzance

H1.text: In which city are the administrative headquarters of the county of Cornwall. St Ives

H2.text: In which city are the administrative headquarters of the county of Cornwall. Falmouth

H3.text: In which city are the administrative headquarters of the county of Cornwall. Truro

A4.text: Cornwall Council is also based in Truro, having its headquarters at Lys Kernow on Treyew Road.
